intro.speaker: Percy
intro.line: Here, Ace! Come to Percy. Come one, come to Percy. Good dragon. You're my only real friend. 'Specially since Pop never visits...

intro.speaker: Percy
intro.line: Uh? What, Ace? Trying to make me feel better?

intro.speaker: Percy
intro.line: Golly, thanks a bunch, Ace! You always know just what to roar! You're the best buddy ever. With you as my sidekick, nothing's gonna get me down! I'm done obeying Pop's dumb rules. Which includes staying here in my Deeprealm. Let's get outta here, Ace!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: He must be around here somewhere. PERCY? HELLO? PERCY? Oh, my son! My offspring! Oh, sidekick, not yet old enough to kick at my side! Why would you leave our most secret of lairs in your Deeprealm? Ew, oogie. Dragon dung, whizzing past my heroic brow? A close call. But where'd it come from?

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Percy! Where have you been? I've been worried sick. Leaving the secret lair? Clearly, you must have gotten lost. No need to worry. I'll have you back home in a flash. Must say it's nice to see you, Son. It's been a while. I hardly recognize you.

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Hmm? What's eating you, Percy? Come on, out with it.

intro.speaker: Percy
intro.line: I hate you, Pops.

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Huh?!

intro.speaker: Percy
intro.line: All your talk about justice... How just is it to never visit me? You're...you're... You're a villain! You're my worst enemy! You're my... You're my archnemesis! W-w-waaaaah!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Never fear, Percy. Pops is here!  Ahoy there, friend!

intro.speaker: Mercenary
intro.line: Ha. Friend? I'm no friend to some jerk who makes kids cry their eyes out.

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Ha Ha! You've fallen into the covered pit of misconception, stranger. Here, I'll help you out before you're gored upon the spikes of wrongheadedness! That was no kid. That was my son. My spawn! Fruit of my loins!

intro.speaker: Mercenary
intro.line: What?! The way he ran off crying? No way. Who are you really villain?!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Evil has met its match! I am Arthur!

intro.speaker: Mercenary
intro.line: Whuh? No you're not! I recognize you! You're...you're...GAZAK!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: No. Your ears must be clogged, friend. Listen up. As I just said... Evil has met its match! I am Arthur!

intro.speaker: Mercenary
intro.line: What?! You can't fool me, Gazak! I'd recognize that chin anywhere! It's got bandit written all over it!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Oh, um, well... I assure you that my chin is not the graffiti wall of evil. Here, fellow, my son comes back. He'll clear this matter up.

intro.speaker: Percy
intro.line: Back, evildoer! Return to whatever dark hole of naughtiness you crawled out of! I think that mercenary has you pegged. You ARE Gazak!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: Percy!

intro.speaker: Mercenary
intro.line: Charge, friends! I've found Gazak! Time for this bandit to come to justice!

intro.speaker: Arthur
intro.line: What? You must be joking.

intro.speaker: Silas
intro.line: Wow, that really spiraled out of control. We'd better get in there and back Arthur up, I guess.

battle.speaker: Mercenary
battle.line: What?! You tapped into a Dragon Vein! That means you're...royalty. You're no ruffian! And that makes you ALL— Oh, I'm sorry! Please, spare my life! Here, do you want money? Take this—it's all yours. I bet more troops would do the same, if only they realized...

recruit-battle.speaker: Percy
recruit-battle.line: It's time to deliver some real justice!

recruit-battle.speaker: Percy
recruit-battle.line: Let's take 'em out, Ace. All of 'em! Pop's next to go!

recruit-battle.speaker: Arthur
recruit-battle.line: Listen up, Son! Your spree of mayhem is over!

recruit-battle.speaker: Percy
recruit-battle.line: Justice never loses! And I am on its side! Not you, Pop!

recruit-battle.speaker: Arthur
recruit-battle.line: Percy, if you insist on this, you leave me no choice but to fight back!

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: *sniffle sniffle*

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: I'm sorry, Percy. I never meant to abandon you. I just thought you were absolutely safe, so my job was done until you were older. I screwed up on a heroic scale. Please, forgive me. From this day forward, I'd love for you to join me as a sidekick. Or maybe I'll be yours. Whatever—just as long as we're a justice-slinging duo!

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Uh...really, Pop? Does that mean that you'll come live in my Deeprealm with me?

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: No, the opposite! You're never going back there.

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Pop, do you really mean it? I can stay here with you?

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: It's true! Right here! With me!

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: W-w-waaah... W-w-waaaaaaaaah!

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: What is it? Did I blunder again?

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: No, I'm just so happy! I didn't want you as my archnemesis, Pop. I really didn't. THIS is what I always wanted.

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: Ha ha! Father-son bond repaired on the nick of time!

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: Hmm? Your dragon? What's got him so darn upset? Whoa! Hold on, big boy. Those are your fangs you're bearing over there.

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Ace, stop! Don't snap at Pops. He didn't do anything bad.

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: Percy! Your trusty steed is looking at me like I'm a meat platter!

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Ace! I'm not sad! Happy! You hear me? HA-PPY! We're staying here with Pops. We don't have to live in our Deeprealm!

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Phew! He's backing off. Good boy! Good boy!

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: Whoa there! I thought you'd be flossing me out of his teeth soon. Glad we cleared all this up. You and your dragon are most welcome with us!

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Golly! Thanks a bunch! I can't wait to learn how to be a better hero from you!

end.speaker: Arthur
end.line: Percy, I'm just glad to have you at my side. Now, ready to sock evil in the face? The ol' one-two? Father-son justice?

end.speaker: Percy
end.line: Ha ha! YEAH!

end.speaker: Silas
end.line: Phew! Good thing that all worked out. Hopefully that'll be the last father-son skirmish we ever see in our party...
